rules_text: When this creature dies, it deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of cards and tokens merged with it.
special_text:
Gestalt [i](When this or another creature you control enters, you may merge it with the one in play, keeping counters and attachments. They become the permanent on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
When this creature dies, it deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of cards and tokens merged with it.
